summary: Arsenal Football Club, based in North London, is one of England's most successful teams. They've won 13 league titles, 14 FA Cups, and many other trophies. Founded in 1886 by munitions workers, they moved to Highbury in 1913, creating the North London derby with Tottenham Hotspur. Ars√®ne Wenger, their longest-serving manager, led them to seven FA Cups and an unbeaten league season in 2003-04, earning the nickname "The Invincibles." In 2006, Arsenal moved to the Emirates Stadium and is now valued at $2.26 billion, making it the world's tenth-most valuable football club.
title: Arsenal F.C.
